pali: “The venerable one is a spoiler of families, one who is ofbad behaviour. The bad behaviour of the venerable one is seen andis heard about, and the families spoilt by the venerable one are seenand are heard about.

pali: “Let the venerableone not speak thus! The bhikkhus are not driven by desire; and thebhikkhus are not driven by anger; and the bhikkhus are not drivenby delusion; and the bhikkhus are not driven by fear.

pali: [and if that bhikkhu,] beingargued with up to three times, should relinquish that [course], thenthis is good, [but] if he should not relinquish [it]: [this is a caseconcerning] the community in the beginning and in the rest [of theprocedure].
